name: ROMANTIC DINNER CRUISE ON SAIGON RIVER
description: Nowadays, the tourists travelling to Saigon will find the city with its amazing history, the French colonial architecture and friendly people if they visit in the daytime. However, at night time, you will be attracted by the charming of Saigon with a number of night activities and joining Dinner Cruise along Saigon River will be a fantastic & unforgettable experience.
